This is an excellent movie. I don't understand why it had such bad reviews. It twists the standard hollywood cliches around more than anything I've seen in a long time. That probably uspets the simpletons who only understand and expected one of the 3 standard plots that constitute your average hollywood movie.

If you have a brain, ignore the moronic criticiism and enjoy.
